page.title: 01Overview of the Area
page.content:
The village of Tatworth comprises three physically close but quite separate communities - Tatworth itself, South Chard and Perry Street. Community spirit is not always as apparent as in a smaller village because of the large number of inhabitants and the relatively large area covered.
It comprises a mixture of new and old housing, agriculture and industry, varied religious groups and a primary school. It is well-served by local traders and is situated in a picturesque part of the country, within easy reach of many places of interest and south coast resorts. Communications by road and rail are good.
